heroes.name: Whisper the Outcast
heroes.description: Whisper is the Initiator, with multiple Direct damage and Mobility options.

skills.text:
Choose One
-An enemy hero in range discards a card if able, then performs a movement action on that card.
-Defeat an adjacent minion.

If another hero in radius has a card in their discard - choose one:
  • This turn: you are immune to attacks.
  • Retrieve a discarded card.
Whenever you would 'choose one' you may choose both instead.
Before the attack move up to 1 space for every empty spawn point in radius and in a battle zone, to a maximum of 2 spaces.
Before the attack move up to 1 space for every empty spawn point in radius and in a battle zone, to a maximum of 3 spaces.
Before the attack move up to 2 spaces for every empty spawn point in radius and in a battle zone, to a maximum of 4 spaces.
Target a hero in range with a card in the discard. Otherwise target an adjacent unit.
Target a hero in range with a card in the discard. Otherwise target an adjacent unit. May repeat once on another hero
Choose a direction. Move 1 enemy minion in radius up to 1 space in that direction.
Choose a direction. Move 2 enemy minions in radius up to 2 space in that direction.
Choose a direction. Move 2 enemy minions in radius up to 2 space in that direction.

An enemy hero in radius chooses one -
  • That hero discards a card, if able
  • You may remove a minion in radius

An enemy hero in radius chooses one -
  • That hero discards a card or is defeated
  • You may remove a 3 minions in radius
Place yourself into an empty minion spawn point in a battle zone in range.
Place yourself onto an empty minion spawn point in a battle zone in range. Next action phase: May repeat once.
Place yourself onto an empty minion spawn point in a battle zone in range. Each action phase this round: May repeat once.
This Round: For every adjacent enemy empty minion spawn point in a battle zone gain +1 attack and +1 defense.
This Round: For every adjacent enemy empty minion spawn point in a battle zone gain +1 attack and +2 defense and +1 initiative.

heroes.name: Tigerclaw
heroes.description: Tigerclaw is one of the best melee Initiators in the game with a strong Escape. He can spec for Disabler, a DPS Assassin build, and thanks to his high Mobility he can be a competent Pusher.

skills.text: Before the attack, move 2 spaces in a straight line ignoring obstacles. Then target an adjacent unity that you moved through.
You may place yourself into a space in radius which is not adjacent to an enemy unit. Next rurn: you are immune and may move through other units. Other units may move through you.
If you are immune. You may move up to 3 spaces before resolvingan action. When you resolve a basic attack, you may repeat it once on a different target.
You may move 1 space after the attack. (if you cannot make this move you may not attack)
Move 1 space before or after the attack.
Move 1 space before and/or after the attack.
When attacking a hero, if there is a friendly hero adjacent to the target gain +3 attack (this does not include you).
When attacking a hero, if there is a friendly hero adjacent to the target gain +4 attack and ignore immunity
Move up to 1 space. The take up to 1 coin from an adjacent enemy Hero and move that number of spaces in a straight line. (you can't take the coin if you can't make the move)
Move up to 2 spaces. The take up to 2 coins from an adjacent enemy Hero and move that number of spaces in a straight line.
Move up to 3 spaces. The take up to 3 coins from an adjacent enemy Hero and move that number of spaces in a straight line.
Give a hero in range a poison marker. Initiative and attack items of a hero with a poison marker reduce the value instead
Give a hero in range a poison marker. Initiative, attack and degense items of a hero with a poison marker reduce the value instead
Move 2 spaces in a straight line. If you do, block a non-basic attack. (a basic attack will defeat you even if you move out of range)
Move 2 spaces in a straight line. If you do, block a non-basic attack. You may then discard an attack card. If you do, retrieve this card
Move 2 spaces in a straight line. If you do, block a non-basic attack. You may then discard another card. If you do, retrieve this card
Block as basic attack. If you do you may retrieve a discarded attack card
Block as basic attack. If you do you may retrieve a played or discarded attack card

heroes.name: Tali the Spiritcaller
heroes.description: Tali is a Disabler and Support, with a wide array of options, ranging from Direct Damage, to Healer and Pusher paths. She can be both a competent Brawler and a Sniper, depending on the build.

skills.text:
Choose One -
  • A hero in range retrieves an unresolved card
  • Defeat an adjacent minion and replace it with an ice token (enemies adjacent to this token lose 1 initiative)
A friendly hero fo your choice names a color. You may discard a card of that color. If you do, perform any one action on that card.
Gain +2 Range and +2 Radius
Next turn, after playing cards. defender may retrieve a discarded card.
After atatck name a color. Defender discards a card of that color if able. Next turn after playing cards: defender may retrieve that card.
After the attack name a color. The defender discard a card of that color if able.
May not attack heroes unless you have a non-red card in the discard.
May not attack non-adjacent heroes unless you have a non-red card in the discard.
Enemies in radius discard a card id able. Next turn after playing cards: affected enemies retrieve that card.
Name a color. Enemies in radius discard a card id able. Next turn after playing cards: affected enemies retrieve that card id able.
Name a color. Enemies in radius discard a card id able. End of next turn: affected enemies retrieve that card id able.
If you have a card in the discard you may retrieve a discarded silver card or have a friendly hero in radius retrieve a discarded card.
If you have a card in the discard you or a friendly hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card.
Place an ice token in radius and adjacentto another ice token if able. Enemies los 1 initiative for every ice token they are adjacent to.
Place an 2 ice tokens in radius and adjacentto another ice token if able. Enemies los 1 initiative for every ice token they are adjacent to.
Place an 3 ice tokens in radius and adjacentto another ice token if able. Enemies los 1 initiative for every ice token they are adjacent to.
Place the totem token on your spawn point in radius. This round: while you have a card in the dicard it counts as a ranged minion.
Place the totem token on a spawn point in radius. This round: while you have a card in the dicard it counts as a ranged minion that is immune to skills.

heroes.name: Wuk the Grove Keeper
heroes.description: Wuk is a Tank with Area Denial, Healer, Controller and Pusher abilities.

skills.text: May not attack unless either you or the target are adjacent to a tree token. After the attack you may move the target 1 space to a space not adjacent to you, if able.
Place a tree token in radius and not adjacent to another tree. May repeat once. Heroes may move through a space with a tree. Do not remove tree tokens at the end of the round.
Adjacent tree tokens in battle count as melee minions immune to ranged minions.
May only attack unit in range and adjacent to a tree.
May only attack unit in range and adjacent to a tree.
May only attack unit in range and adjacent to a tree. May repeat once on a different hero.
When moving in a straight line you may move through enemy units. The first enemy unit you move through discards a card or is defeated.
When moving in a straight line you may move through enemy units. Each enemy unit you move through discards a card or is defeated.
You may retrieve a discarded card id you are adjacent to a tree.
Either you or a hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card if either of you are adjacent to a tree.
Both you and a hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card if either of you are adjacent to a tree.
This round: Up to 1 adjacent enemy minion does not count towards the minion total during the minion battle.
This round: Up to 2 adjacent enemy minions does not count towards the minion total during the minion battle.
Move up to 1 space. Push an adjacent token up to 5. If it is pushed at least 2 spaces. Enemies adjacent to it discard a card if able.
Move up to 1 space. Push an adjacent token or minion up to 5. If it is pushed at least 2 spaces. Enemies adjacent to it discard a card if able.
Move up to 1 space. Push an adjacent token or unit up to 5. If it is pushed at least 2 spaces. Enemies adjacent to it discard a card if able.
Swap places with a tree in radius. You may then place a unit adjacent to that tree into a space adjacent to you.
Swap places with a tree in radius. You may then place a unit adjacent to that tree into a space adjacent to you. May repeat once

heroes.name: Xargatha the Changed
heroes.description: Xargatha is primarily a Melee Brawler and Disabler. She can also act as a, Tank, Ranged Pusher, Initiator and Support.

skills.text: This turn: If you discard and attack card to defend you may perform its primary action, if able, after the attacker resolves their card.
Move the nearest non-immune enemy unitin range up to 4 spaces towards you, following the shortest path.
You may move through obstacles. At the start of each turn an adjacent enemy hero of your choice discards a card if able.
+1 attak for every adjacent enemy unit.
+2 Attack for every adjacent enemy unit.
+3 Attack for every adjaent enemy unit..
May not target adjacent units.
May not target adjacent units. If you are adjacent to at least one enemy unit, may repeat once on a different target.
This turn: if there is one enemy hero in radius that hero is immune, may not move, and counts as terrain.
This turn:the nearest enemy hero in radius is immune, may not move, and counts as terrain.
This turn:the nearest enemy hero in radius is immune, may not move, and counts as terrain. May repeat once.
If you are adjacent to enemy minion may retrieve a discarded card.
If you are adjacent to enemy unit may retrieve a discarded card.
This round: enemy melee minions in radius count as if on your team for the purpose of defense modifiers.
This round: enemy melee and ranged minions in radius count as if on your team for the purpose of defense modifiers.
This round: all enemy minions, including the immune ones, in radius count as if on your team for the purpose of defense modifiers.
Next turn: Adjacent enemy heroes may only move with an attack card.
Next turn: Adjacent enemy heroes may only move with a basic attack card.

heroes.name: NebKher the Harbinger
heroes.description: NebKher is a Ranged Specialist with Sniper, Controller, Area denial, Disabler, Escape and Mobility options.

skills.text:
Choose One:
  • Perform the primary action on the card in the previous turn slot of an enemy hero in range
  • Defeat and adjacent enemy minion

Laugh Diabolically, if you do choose one
  • Sqpa places with an illusion token in radius
  • Swap places with a friendly minion
  • You are defeated by the nearest enemy hero
If you would be defeated first defeat all non-immune enemy minions in range and enemy heroes in range discard a card or are defeated. Then you are defeated.
Move a friendly minion in range up to 2 spaces then target a hero in range adjacent to it.
Move a friendly minion in range up to 3 spaces then target a hero in range adjacent to it.
Move a friendly minion in range up to 3 spaces then target a hero in range adjacent to it. May repeat once with a different minion.
If you target a hero you may swap any two of their resolved or discarded cards.
If you target a hero you may swap any two of their resolved, unresolved or discarded cards.
A hero in radius must swap their unresolved card with another card in their hand if able.
A hero in radius must swap their unresolved card with another card in their hand if able.
A hero in radius must swap their unresolved card with another card in their hand if able, May repeat once on the same or another hero.
Split the board in a line of spaces drawn through your space. This turn: Units on either side may not effect units on the other side.
Split the board in a line of spaces drawn through your space. This turn: Units on either side may not effect you or units on the other side.
Place an illusion token in radius. This round: If you discard a card swap places with an illusion token and remove all illusion tokens.
Place up to 2 illusion tokens in radius. This round: If you discard a card swap places with an illusion token and remove all illusion tokens.
Place up to 3 illusion tokens in radius. This round: If you discard a card swap places with an illusion token and remove all illusion tokens.
Place an illusion token in radius. When you are performing an action it counts as a meee minion.
Place an illusion token in radius. It is immune to enemy actions. When you are performing an action it counts as a meee minion.

heroes.name: Cutter the Sky Captain
heroes.description: Cutter is a high-Mobility hero with Initiator, Controller, Sniper, Crowd Control and Tank choices.

skills.text: Defeate an adjacent minion or push an adjacent hero up to 3 spaces. If that pushed an enemy hero into a different zone, that hero discards a card or is defeated.
Choose an obstacle in range and in a straight line with no other obstacles between you. MOve in a straight line towards that obstacle until you are adjacent to it.
Each time after you perform a primary action, you may perform that primary action of a card in the previous turn slot.
Before the attack you may move 1 space in a straight line. If you do gain +3 attack and target and adjacent enemy on the direction of your omovement.
Before the attack you may move 1 or 2 spaces in a straight line. If you do gain +3 attack and target and adjacent enemy on the direction of your omovement.
Before the attack you may move 1 to 3 spaces in a straight line. If you do gain +4 attack and target and adjacent enemy on the direction of your omovement.
Target the first unit in a straight line. You may then move up to 2 spaces in a straight line directly away from the target.
Target the first unit in a straight line. You may then move up to 2 spaces in a straight line.
Non-adjacent enemy hero in radius adjacent to another enemy unit discards a card if able.
Non-adjacent enemy hero in radius adjacent to another enemy unit discards a card if able.
Non-adjacent enemy hero in radius adjacent to another enemy unit discards or is defeated.
Place a coin in radius. End of Turn: You may place yourself in a space with a coin. A hero is a space with a coin takes it. Remove remaining coins.
Place 1 or 2 coins in radius. End of Turn: You may place yourself in a space with a coin. A hero is a space with a coin takes it. Remove remaining coins.
Move 3 spaces in a straight line ignoring obstacles. Then 1 adjacent enemy hero discards a card if able.
Move 2 or 3 spaces in a straight line ignoring obstacles. Then 1 adjacent enemy hero discards a card if able.
Move 2 to 4 spaces in a straight line ignoring obstacles. Then 1 adjacent enemy hero discards a card if able.
If the attacker has a card in the discard, block the attack.
If the attacker has a card in the discard, block the attack. You may then retrieve a resolved card.
